| 7 | 6 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. ( Base ` W ) /\ b e. ( Base ` W ) ) ) -> ( a ( +g ` W ) b ) = ( a ( +g ` A ) b ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_grpidpropd | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` W ) = ( 0g ` A ) ) |
